FILE: cm740910v11.0.txt
DYAD: JAPAN - PAPUA NEW GUINEA
RIVALRY: RIV1337
DISPUTE(S): MID2748 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20190520
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20190520

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID2748 

TERRMID: MID2748 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID2748 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID2748 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: MID2748 from Gibler 2018, in 1988 Papua New Guinea seized a Japanese fishing vessel. Coded not maritime because Japan and PNG did not dispute a maritime boundary, although they did dispute Japan's access to fishing rights in the area, from Sydney Morning Herald 11/16/1988. This was an economic issue and not a maritime boundary issue. 

ISLMID: MID2748 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID2748 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID2748 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID2748 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID2748 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID2748 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

Sidney Morning Herald (1988). Pacific Row Brews Over Fishing Rights. Sidney Morning Herald November 16. By Helen O’Neil: 13.
